item.title: Nicole add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You're off to Great Places! Today is your day! Your mountain is waiting, So... get on your way!" -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Frank Lloyd Wright
item.description: "I believe in God, only I spell it Nature." -- Frank Lloyd Wright

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Roger Caras
item.description: "Dogs are not our whole life, but they make our lives whole." -- Roger Caras

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Henry David Thoreau
item.description: "Live in each season as it passes; breathe the air, drink the drink, taste the fruit, and resign yourself to the influence of the earth." -- Henry David Thoreau

item.title: Nicole add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description:
"All that is gold does not glitter, Not all those who wander are lost; The old that is strong does not wither, Deep roots are not reached by the frost.
From the ashes a fire shall be woken, A light from the shadows shall spring; Renewed shall be blade that was broken, The crownless again shall be king." -- J.R.R. Tolkien
